feed.title: Homepage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Added gatus uptime widget by @Nedra1998 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2729
  • Fix: iCal integration use event data hash instead of unstable uid by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2758
  • Enhancement: extend hdhomerun widget by @JeffRandall and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2757

New Contributors

  • @Nedra1998 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2729
  • @JeffRandall made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2757

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.6...v0.8.7

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: OpenWRT service widget by @DanGRT and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2782
  • Feature: search suggestions for search and quick launch by @Flo2410 and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2775
  • Fix quick launch not opening with accented characters, decoding of characters in suggestions by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2802
  • Update packages, add dependabot for npm by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2803
  • Chore(deps): Bump compare-versions from 5.0.3 to 6.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2809
  • Fix: Add formatting to Immich totals by @JackBailey in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2814
  • Chore(deps): Bump react-i18next from 11.18.6 to 12.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2810
  • Chore(deps): Bump dockerode from 3.3.5 to 4.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2812
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump tailwind-scrollbar from 2.1.0 to 3.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2813
  • Unifi widget: Show a more helpful error if specified site not found by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2839
  • Fix: Increase icon z-index by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2842
  • Chore(deps): Bump pre-commit/action from 3.0.0 to 3.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2854
  • Enhancement: initially collapsed option for layout groups by @Flo2410 and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2863
  • Chore: add Python requirements and prettier to devcontaier by @Flo2410 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2878
  • Fix: iCal integration fails with all-day events by @sasagar and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2883

New Contributors

  • @DanGRT made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2782
  • @JackBailey made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2814
  • @sasagar made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2883

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.7...v0.8.8

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Add list view for custom api by @sgrtye and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2891
  • Change: use Script component instead of async script for custom.js by @Cyberbeni in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2901
  • Change: move custom.css linking to head to avoid FOUC by @Cyberbeni and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2916
  • Enhancement: Add enablePools option to TrueNAS service widget by @dstotz and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2908
  • Enhancement: Add requestBody as option for customapi widget by @dstotz in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2921
  • Enhancement: allow api auth with moonraker service by @stevendejongnl and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2934
  • Add Plant-it widget by @MDeLuise and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2941
  • Chore(deps): Bump systeminformation from 5.21.24 to 5.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2999
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint from 8.56.0 to 8.57.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3000
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump postcss from 8.4.33 to 8.4.35 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3001
  • Chore(deps): Bump recharts from 2.11.0 to 2.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3002
  • Fix: support cyrillic characters in quicklaunch by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3020
  • Fix: docker status labels colors by @RoboMagus and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3028
  • Enhancement: Add formatting options to weather widgets by @benphelps in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3093
  • Feature: Add Homebox widget by @cadeluca in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3095

New Contributors

  • @Cyberbeni made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2901
  • @dstotz made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2908
  • @stevendejongnl made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2934
  • @MDeLuise made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/2941
  • @cadeluca made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3095

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.8...v0.8.9

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: field parsing can fail with docker labels by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3101
  • Fix: Add alternative 'offline' status to EspHome widget by @RoboMagus in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3107
  • Fix: log error when getting services from Docker server fails by @she11sh0cked in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3147
  • Fix: Glances cpu & info widgets information by @sunnycloudy1337 and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3164
  • Enhancement: support Jackett widget with admin password by @technowhizz and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3165
  • Fix: correctly handle direct tab navigation with encoded chars by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3172

New Contributors

  • @she11sh0cked made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3147
  • @sunnycloudy1337 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3164
  • @technowhizz made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3165

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.9...v0.8.10

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: support for glances v4 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3196
  • Feature: crowdsec widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3197
  • Enhancement: support pi-hole v6 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3207
  • Fix: remove invalid form attribute by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3210
  • Fix: Homebridge widget login by @LucaHerrero in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3220
  • Fix: TrueNAS Core support for pool stats by @rgon10 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3206
  • Fix: rename pialert to netalertx by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3253

Maintenance

  • Chore(deps): Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3211
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump postcss from 8.4.35 to 8.4.38 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3212
  • Chore(deps): Bump recharts from 2.12.2 to 2.12.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3215
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react from 7.33.2 to 7.34.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3213
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump tailwindcss from 3.4.1 to 3.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3214

New Contributors

  • @LucaHerrero made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3220
  • @rgon10 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3206

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.10...v0.8.11
